thread.title: BRIEF-Kaap Agri Sees Improved Revenue Growth In Next 6 Months

title: BRIEF-Kaap Agri Sees Improved Revenue Growth In Next 6 Months
text:
May 7, 2018 / 8:08 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Kaap Agri Sees Improved Revenue Growth In Next 6 Months Reuters Staff
May 7 (Reuters) - Kaap Agri Bedryf Employee and Farm Worker Bee Trust: * HY REVENUE UP 5,4%* TO R3,4 BILLION
* HY RECURRING HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE UP 7,2% TO 223,12 CENTS * INTERIM DIVIDEND PER SHARE UP 8,8% TO 32,00 CENTS
* STRATEGIES FIRMLY ON TRACK TO DELIVER SUPERIOR RETURNS IN LINE WITH STRATEGIC MEDIUM-TERM PLANS
* “REMAIN OPTIMISTIC THAT COMING AGRICULTURAL SEASON SHOULD IMPROVE”
* IMPROVED REVENUE GROWTH IS ANTICIPATED FOR NEXT SIX MONTHS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
